byteremote.client

Interface ByteClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteTCPClient, ByteUDPClient

    public interface ByteClient

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect from server.
      java.lang.Object sendRequest(java.lang.Class<?> responseType, java.lang.Object... parameters)
      Send a request to server to be processed.

    • Method Detail

      • sendRequest

        java.lang.Object sendRequest(java.lang.Class<?> responseType,
                             java.lang.Object... parameters)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a request to server to be processed.
        Parameters:
        responseType - - Type of the expected response (e.g. String, int, etc.. or null if no response is expected)
        parameters - - The request parameters
        Returns:
        response - The response or null if no response is expected
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - In case the socket creation fails

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Disconnect from server. Close the tcp client socket
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - In case of the socket close fails
